name: Bop the Blops
description:
Bop the Blops - The ultimate color match game starring Professor Bop!

If you love matching games, fun arcade puzzle games, this one is for you.

Help Professor Bop keep track of those pesky Blops by bopping them.

This game requires a fast mind and quick reflexes.

Bop the Blops is designed to help children develop their motor skills in the most fun way possible.

Have fun!
